remarks: A condition that allows us to represent "the unique element such that ` ph ` " with a class expression ` A ` .  (Contributed by NM, 30-Dec-2014.)
statement:
iota2df.1 $e |- ( ph -> B e. V ) $.
iota2df.2 $e |- ( ph -> E! x ps ) $.
iota2df.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = B ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
iota2d $p |- ( ph -> ( ch <-> ( iota x ps ) = B ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x $.
